title: Vengeance: The Book of Shane e-short #3 (Spirit Animals: Special Edition)
description: These e-shorts shine a light on one of the most compelling villains of the New York Times bestselling Spirit Animals series. Now collected in the Book of Special Edition!The war is over and Erdas is rebuilding. It seems everyone is celebrating a new age of peace.Everyone except Shane. Shane wants revenge.The young Conqueror is on the hunt, tracking a target who knows his every move before it happens. He's closing in on his prey -- but the closer Shane gets, the more he begins to see patterns in the shadows. Shane can sense a trap is waiting. He's being led down a path that he may not be able to return from. Will he abandon his quest for vengeance . . . or follow it into the darkness?
author: Nick Eliopulos
